game.name: ROUNDS
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rounds is a 1v1 rogue-lite shooter where each round gets more intense. The losing player of each round unlocks clever upgrades to create a better build to counter their opponent.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rounds is a 1v1 rogue-lite shooter where each round gets more intense. The losing player of each round unlocks clever upgrades to create a better build to counter their opponent.

reviewHighlights.text: I choose cards. I make my gun powerful. I shoot an atom bomb. Then all my friends get obliterated into dust. This is a great game.
If monkeys could talk, this would be the game they would eat. Eating, by the way, is very delicious, if you didn't know. This game has no eating whats...
